name: Shoutbawks Skin v1 - Dark
description: Dark skin for MGC Chatbox Evo plugin found at OwnedCore.
additional_info:
- Removes the group icons on the left
- Removes the dropdown menu for shouts
- Moves the shouts all the way to the left
- Expands shout space to 100% fit the bawks
- Changes all shout colors to light gray and removes bold
- Links are white
